Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Loka kisa ciza bare pucha rahe hana
Usa vadi sucana bare
Jisa bare iha loka matabheda karade hana
Kade vi nahim, jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Kade vi nahim, jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Ki asim dharati nu pharasa nahim bana'i'a
Ate paharam nu mekham (sahara dena vale khabe)
Ate tuhanu asim' jore-jore bana'i'a
Ate ninda nu tuhadi thakana dura karana la'i bana'i'a
Ate rata nu parada bana'i'a
Ate asim dina nu rozi kama'una da samam bana'i'a
Ate asim tuhade upara sata pake asamana bana'e
Ate asim unham vica ika camakada ho'i'a diva rakha dita
Ate asim pani nala bhare badalam rahi' mohaledhara minha varasa'i'a
Tam ki asim usa de rahim anaja ate sabazi'am uga'i'e
Ate saghane baga
Besaka faisale de dina da samam nisacita hai
Jisa dina sura vica bigala vaja'i'a javega, phira tusim jhudam de jhuda avoge
Ate asamana khaul'ha dita javega, phira usa vica daravaze hi daravaze ho janage
Ate pahara cala dita janage uha reta varage ho janage
Besaka naraka ghata vica hai
Bagi'am da tikana
Usa vica uha lame samem taka pa'e rahinage
Usa vica na uha kise thadaka nu cakhanage ate na pina vali ziza nu
Paratu khaul'hada pani ate (jakhamam di) pika
Unham de karama anusara badala hai
Uha hisaba da dara nahim rakhade sana
Ate unham ne sadi'am a'itam nu sapurana jhuthala' dita
Ate asim hara ciza nu likha ke usa di ginati kara rakhi hai
Tam cakho. Asim tuhadi saza vadha'unde janvage
Besaka darana vali'am la'i safalata hai
Saga ate agura
ate barabara umara vali'am naujavana laraki'am
Ate bhare ho'e jama
Uthe uha mithi'a ate jhuthi'am galam nahim sunanage
Tere raba valom unham de karamam de anusara badala hovega
Rahimana valom jihara akasa ate dharati ate unham de vicakara di'am cizam da palanahara hai. Ko'i takata nahim rakhada ki usa nala gala kare
Jisa dina jibarila ate farisate kataram bana ke kharhe honage, (usa vele) ko'i nahim' bolega. Paratu (usa tom' binham? Jisa nu rahimana agi'a deve ate uha yoga gala kahega)
Iha dina nisacita hai, sau jihara cahe apane raba vala (apana) tikana bana lave
Asim tuhanu nere a jana vali saza tom dara dita hai. Jisa dina manukha usa nu dekha lavega, jihara usa de hatham ne age bheji'a hai tam avagi'akari akhega ki kasa! Maim siti huda
Sahu hai jaram tom putana vali'am havavam di
Ate sahu hai, sadhama calana vali'am havavam di
Ate sahu hai, tairana vale badalam di
Phira age vadhana vali'am di
phira mamali'am da upa'a karana vali'am di
Jisa dina hila dena vali hila devegi
Usa tom magarom ika hora a'una vali ciza avegi
Kine dila usa tom kaba rahe honage
Unham di'am akham jhuka rahi'am honagi'am
Uha kahide hana ki ki asim pahili halata vica vapisa janvage
Ki jadom sadi'am hadi'am gala sara janagi'am
Unham ne akhi'a ki iha vapasi tam bare ghate vali hovegi
Uha tam basa ika jhiraka hovegi
Phira turata uha maidana vica hazira honage
Ki tuhade kola musa di gala pahuci hai
Jadom ki usa de raba ne usa nu tuva di pavitara ghati vica pukari'a
Phira'auna de kola ja'u uha bagi ho gi'a hai
Phira usa nu pucho, ki ki tainu isa gala di icha hai ki tu sudhara javem
Ate maim tainu tere raba da raha dikhavam, phira tu dare
So musa ne usa nu vadi nisani dikha'i
Phira usa ne jhuthala'i'a ate na mani'a
Phira uha palati'a, yatana karade ho'e
Phira usa ne ikatha kita, phira usa ne pukari'a
So usa ne akhi'a ki maim tuhada sabha tom vada raba ham
Tam alaha ne usa nu praloka ate sasara di saza vica pharhi'a
Besaka isa vica hareka usa bade la'i sikhi'a hai, jihara (alaha tom) dare
Ki tuhada bana'una zi'ada aukha hai jam akasa da, alaha ne usa nu bana'i'a
Usa di chata nu uca kita, phira usa nu thika kita
Phira usa di rata nu haneri bana'i'a ate usa de dina nu prakasavana kita
Ate usa tom ba'ada dharati nu phaila'i'a
Isa vicom usa da pani ate cara kadhi'a
Ate paharam nu sathapita kita
Tuhade la'i ate tuhade pasu'am la'i jivana samagari de rupa vica (paida kita)
Phira jadom uha vadi afata avegi
Jisa dina manukha apane kite nu yada karega
Ate dekhana vali'am de sahamane naraka pragata kara dita javega
Tam jisa ne sagavata kiti
Ate sasarika jivana nu pahila diti
Tam unham da tikana naraka honvega
Ate jihara bada apane raba de sahamane kharhe hona tom dari'a ate apane mana nu buri'am ichavam tom roki'a
Tam usa da tikana janata hovega
Uha ki'amata de sabadha vica puchade hana ki iha kadom vaparegi
Usa di caraca nala tuhada ki sabadha hai
Iha mamala tere raba nala sabadhita hai
Tam tusim sirafa usa bade nu dara'una vale ho, jihara dare
Jisa dina iha usa nu (tam ajiha khi'ala karanage) dekhanage tam jano uha sasara vica thahire hi nahim. Jivem (duni'am vica sirafa) ika sama jam ika savera batita kiti hove
Usa ne mathe ti'uri'am carha'i'am ate muha phera li'a
Isa gala la'i ki usa de kaula anham a'i'a
Ate tuhanu ki pata ki uha sudhara jave
Jam uha upadesa nu sune ate upadesa usa de kama a jave
Jihara bada laparavahi varatada hai
Tusim usa di cita vica pa'e rahide ho
Halanki jekara uha na sudhare tam tuhade ute usa di ko'i zimevari nahim
Ate jihara bada tuhade kaula bhajada ho'i'a a'unda hai
Ate uha darada hai
Tam tusim usa nala laparavahi varatade ho
Kade vi nahim, iha tam ika upadesa hai
So jihara cahe usa nu yada kare
Uha ajihe satikarayoga sahifi'am (gratham) vica hai
Jihare sresata ate pavitara hana
Likhana vali'am de hatham vica
Izatadara ate neka
Bura hove manukha da, uha kiho jiha akritaghana (na-sukara) hai
Usa nu alaha ne kisa ciza tom paida kita hai
Ika buda tom usa nu paida kita, phira usa la'i adaza thahira'i'a
Phira usa la'i rasata saukha kara dita
Phira usa nu mauta diti, phira usa nu kabara vica lai gi'a
Phira jadom uha cahega tam usa nu mura jivita kara devega
Kade vi nahim usa ne uha pura nahim' kita, jisa da alaha ne usa nu hukama kita si
So manukha nu cahida hai ki uha apane bhojana nu dekhe
Asim cagi tar'ham pani varasa'i'a
Phira asim dharati nu khasa taura te pari'a
Phira usa vica anaja uga'i'a
Agura ate tarakari'am
Jaituna ate khajura
Ate saghane baga
Fala ate hari'ali
Tuhade ate tuhade pasu'am la'i jivana samagari de rupa vica (iha sara kujha paida kita)
So jadom (ki'amata da) kanam nu bola kara dena vala uha sora hovega
Jisa dina manukha apane bharavam tom (dura) bhajega
Ate apani mam tom ate apane pi'u tom
Ate apani patani ate apane putaram tom
Unham vicom hareka bada nu usa dina ajiha phikara hovega, jihara unham nu dusari'am tom beparavaha kara devega
Kujha cihare usa dina camaka rahe honage
Hasade ho'e ate khusi'am manade ho'e
Ate usa dina kujha cihari'am te dhura miti uda rahi hovegi
Unham ute kalakha cha'i ho'i hovegi
Iha hi loka dhitha avagi'akari hana
Jadom suraja nu lapeta dita javega
Ate jadom tare prakasahina ho janage
Ate jadom pahara cala'e janage
Ate jadom dasa mahini'am di'am gabhana uthani'am avara phiranagi'am
Ate jadom sare jagali janavara ikathe kite janage
Ate jadom samudara (aga nala) bhataka dite janage
Ate jadom' iko tar'ham de loka ikathe kite janage
Ate ji'undi dafana kiti laraki tom puchi'a javega
Ki uha kisa phosa vica mari ga'i
Ate jadom karama patara khol'he janage
Ate jadom asamana khul'ha javega
Ate naraka di aga bhataka'i javegi
Ate janata nu nere li'anda javega
Hara ika bada jana lavega ki uha ki lai ke a'i'a hai
Maim sahu khanda ham unham piche hatana vale tari'am di
Calana ate chipa jana vale tari'am di
Ate rata di (sahu) jadom uha jana lage
Ate savera di jadom uha a'unna lage
Ki iha ika sanamanayoga sadesavahaka'te ho'i bani hai
Takata vale, arasam de malaka de kola uce daraje vala
Usa di gala mani jandi hai. Uha bharose vala hai
Ate tuhada sathi masatana nahim hai
Ate usa ne usa (pharisate) nu (asamana'te) pratakha (purabi kadhe te) vekhi'a hai
Ate uha gupata galam la'i zi'ada utasuka nahim
Ate iha phitakare ho'e saiaitana da bola nahim
Phira tusim kidhara ja rahe ho
iha ta sirafa sasara vali'am la'i ika upadesa hai
Usa la'i jihara tuhade vicom sidha calana cahe
Ate tusim kujha nahim kara sakade, paratu iha ki sasara da palanahara alaha cahe
Jadom asamana pata javega
Ate tare khilara janage
Ate jadom samudara (ikathe ho ke) vaga painage
Ate jadom kabaram khol'ha diti'am janagi'am
Hareka bada jana lavega ki usane age ki bheji'a ate piche ki chadi'a
He manukha! Tuhanu kihari ciza ne apane raba valom dhokhe vica pa rakhi'a hai
Jisa ne tuhanu paida kita, phira tere agam nu thika kita, phira tuhanu satulata vica rakhi'a
Phira jisa rupa vica cahi'a tuhanu akara de dita
Kade vi nahim; sagom tusim inasafa de dina tom inakara karade ho
Halanki asi' tuhade te nigarana niyukata karana vale ham
Uce rutabe ate (tuhadi'am galam) likhana vale
Uha janade hana jo tusim karade ho
Besaka neka loka arama vica honage
Ate besaka aparadhi naraka vica
Inasafa de dina uha usa vica sute janage
Uha usa tom alaga hona vale nahim
Ate tuhanu ki pata ki inasafa da dina ki hai
“Phera,ate tuhanu ki pata ki inasafa da dina ki hai
Usa dina ko'i prani kise duje prani la'i kujha nahim kara sakega. Ate mamala usa dina alaha de hi adhikara vica hovega
Napa tola vica kami karana vali'am la'i vinasa hai
Jihare lokam tom napa ke laina tam pura laina
Ate jadom unham nu napa ke jam tola ke dena tam ghata ke dena
Ki iha loka nahim samajhade ki uha cuke jana vale hana
Ika vade dina nu
Jisa dina sare loka sasara de malaka de sahamane kharhe honage
Kade vi nahim, besaka papi'am da amalanama sijina (naraka da ika bhaga) vica hovega
Ate tusim ki samajho ki sijina ki hai
Iha ika likhi'a ho'i'a dafatara hai
Usa dina inakara karana vali'am la'i vinasa hai
Jihare inasafa de dina tom inakara karade hana
Ate usa tom uha hi bada inakara karada hai, jihara hadam da ulaghana karana vala hove, papi hove
Jadom iha pichali'am (ho cuki'am) di'am kahani'am hana
Kade vi nahim, sagom unham de dilam te unham de karamam da zaga carha gi'a
Kade vi nahim, sagom usa dina uha apane raba valom ita vica rakho janage
Phira uha naraka vica dakhila honage
Phira akhi'a javega ki uha ciza hai, jisa nu tusim jhuthala'unde si
Kade vi nahim, besaka neka lokam da karama patara (amala) iliyi (neka lokam de amala rakhana di tham) vica hana
Ate tusim ki jano ki iliyi ki hai
Likhi'a ho'i'a dafatara hai
Jisa de nazadika uca kauti de farisate hazira rahide hana
Besaka neka loka arama vica honage
Uha takhatam te baithe dekhade honage
Unham de cihari'am vica tusim arama di tazagi mahisusa karoge
Unham nu sudha mohara bada saraba pila'i'a javega
Jisa te musaka di mohara hovegi. Ate iha ciza hai jisa di kamana karana vali'am nu kamana karani cahidi hai
Ate usa saraba vica tasanima (janata di ika nahira) di milavata hovegi
Ika ajiha jharana jisa vicom (alaha de) nazadiki loka pinage
Besaka jihare loka aparadhi sana, uha imana vali'am te hasade sana
Ate jadom uha unham de sahamani'o laghade hana, tam uha apisa vica akham de isare karade sana
Ate jadom uha apane lokam vica vapisa a'unde hana tam maujam karade a'unde hana
Ate jadom uha unham nu dekhade hana, tam akhade hana ki iha bhatake ho'e loka hana
Jadom ki uha unham te pahiredara bana ke nahim bheje ga'e sana
So aja imana vale avagi'akari'am te hasade honage
Uha takhatam te baithe dekha rahe honage
Besaka vica avagi'akari'am nu unham de kite da khuba badala mili'a
Jadom asamana pata javega
Uha apane raba da hukama suna lavega ate usa la'i zaruri vi iho hai
Ate jadom dharati padhara kara diti javegi
Ate uha apane adara di'am cizam nu ugala devegi ate khali ho javegi
Ate uha apane raba da hukama suna lavegi ate uha isa de la'ika hai
He manukha! Tu apane palanahara vala khicada cali'a ja riha hai, phira tu usa nu milana vala hai
Tam jisa nu usa da karama patara (amala) usa de saje hatha vica dita javega
Usa tom asani nala hisaba li'a javega
Ate uha apane lokam de pasa khusi khusi avega
Ate jisa da karama patara (amala) usa di pitha ve pichi'um' dita javega
Uha mauta nu avazam marega
Ate naraka vica dakhila hovega
Uha apane lokam vica cita mukata rahida si
Usa ne samajhi'a si ki usa ne vapisa nahim jana
Ki'um nahim, usa da raba usa nu dekha riha si
Tam nahim, maim sahu khanda ham, saphaka (suraja phubana vele di lali) di
Ate rata di'am unham cizam di jinham nu uha sameta laindi hai
Ate cana di jadom uha pura ho jave
Ki tusim zarura ika daraje tom ba'ada duje daraje te pahucauge
Tam inham nu ki ho gi'a ki iha imana nahim li'a'unde
Ate jadom' unham de sahamane kura'ana parhi'a janda hai, tam uha alaha vala nahim jhukade
Sagom uha avagi'akari jhuthala rahe hana
Ate alaha janada hai jihara kujha uha ikatha kara rahe hana
So unham nu ika daradanaka saza di khusakhabari de devo
Paratu jihare loka imana li'a'e ate unham ne cage karama kite, unham la'i kade na khatama hona vala badala hai
Sahu hai burajam (tara madala) vale asamana di
Ate va'ade vale dina di
Ate dekhana vale di ate jihara dekhi'a gi'a
Nasa ho'e kha'i vale
Jinham vica bhatakade ho'e balana di aga si
Jadom ki uha usa te baithe ho'e sana
Ate jo kujha uha imana li'a'una vali'am nala kara rahe sana. Uha usa nu dekha rahe si
Ate unham nala usa da vaira isa tom bina hora kise karana nahim si, ki uha usa alaha upara imana li'a'e, jihara takatavara ate prasasa vala hai
Dharati ate asamanam vica usa da hi samaraja hai ate alaha hara ciza nu dekha riha hai
Jinham lokam ne momina maradam ate maumina auratam nu dukha dite, phira tauba na kiti, tam unham la'i naraka di saza hai
Ate unham la'i sarana di saza hai. Besaka jihare loka imana li'a'e ate cage karama kite, unham la'i (uha) baga hana, jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am ate iha vadi safalata hai
Besaka tere raba di pakara bari sakhata hai
Uha hi arabha karada hai ate uha hi duji vara ji'unda karega
Ate uha hi mu'afi dena vala hai. Prema karana vala hai
Uce sighasanam da malaka
Jo cahuda hai kara dida hai
Ki tuhanu phaujam di khabara puji hai
Phira'auna ate samuda di
Sagom iha avagi'akari jhuthala'una lage ho'e hana
Ate alaha ne usa nu care pasi'am tom gheri'a ho'i'a hai
Sagom uha ika goravasali kura'ana hai
Loha-e-mahiphuza vica likhi'a ho'i'a hai
Sahu hai, asamana vi ate rata nu pragata hona vale di
Ate tusi ki jano ki uha rata nu pragata hona vala ki hai
Camakila tara
Ko'i bada ajiha nahim hai jisa de upara nigarana na hove
Tam manukha nu dekhana cahida hai ki uha kisa ciza tom' paida kita gi'a hai
Uha ika uchalade ho'e pani tom paida kita gi'a hai
Jihara nikalada hai pitha ate chati de vicom
Besaka uha (alaha) usa nu mura janama dena di takata rakhada hai
Jisa dina gupata galam di parakha hovegi
Usa vele manukha de kola na ko'i bala hovega ate na ko'i saha'ika
Sahu hai asamana de cakara marana vale di
Ate phatana vali dharati di
Besaka iha paki gala hai
Ate iha mazaka di gala nahim
Iha hujatam karana vica lage ho'e hana
Ate mai' vi yojana bana'una vica lagi'a ho'i'a ham
Tam tusim avagi'akari'am nu kujha dhila devem, basa kujha dinam di hi dhila devo
Apane palanahara de nama di pavitarata da varanana karo, jihara sabha tom sresata hai
Jisa ne paida kita phira savari'a
Jisa ne (samajha diti) thahira'i'a ate phira raha vikha'i'a
Jisa ne ghaha (cara) paida kita
Phira usa nu kale raga da kura bana dita
Asim tuhanu parhavange, phira tusim nahim bhuloge
Paratu jo alaha cahe, uha janada hai, `gujhi'am vi ate pragata vi
Ate asim tuhanu saukhe raha te lai calange
Tam sikhi'a devem, jekara sikhi'a labha deve
Uha bada upadesa savikara karega jihara darada hai
Uha jihara abhaga hovega, usa tom muha morega
Uha vadi aga vica digega
Uha na usa vica marega ate nam ji'unda rahega
Uha safala ho'i'a jisa ne apane apa nu pavitara kita
Ate apane raba da nama li'a, phira namaza parhi
Sagom tusim dhuni'avi jivana nu ahami'ata dide ho
Ate praloka bihatara hai ate satha'i hai
Iha pahile sahifi'am (gratham? Vica vi hai)
Musa ate ibarahima de sahifi'am vica
Ki tuhanu usa cha jana vali di sucana pahuci hai
Kujha cihare usa dina be'izata honage
Sakhata mihanata karana vale thake ho'e
Uha bharakadi ho'i aga vica painage
Ubalade ho'e jharani'a vicom pani pila'i'a javega
Unham la'i kadi'am vale jhara tom binam hora ko'i bhojana nahim hovega
Jihara na razi karega ate na bhukha mita'ega
Kujha cihare usa dina khusa honage
Apani kama'i te khusa honage
Uce bagam vica
Uha unham vica ko'i bekara gala nahim sunanage
Usa vica vagade ho'e jharane honage
Usa vica uce takhata viche ho'e honage
Ate abakhore (pi'ale) sahamane rakhe honage
Ate gade (sirahane) pakati'am vica lage (honage) ho'e
Ate hareka disa vica pa'e ho'e galice
Ki iha loka utha nu nahim vekhade ki kivem paida kita gi'a hai
Ate akasa nu ki iha kivem uca kita gi'a hai
Ate paharam nu vi ki uha kisa taram kharhe kite ga'e hana
Ate dharati nu, ki uha kisa tar'ham vicha'i ga'i hai
So tusim yada kara devo, tusim sirapha yada kara'una vale ho
Tusi' unham te daroga nahim
Paratu jisa ne muha mori'a ate inakara kita
Tam alaha usa nu vada dada devega
Sade vala hi unham di vapasi hai
Phira sade zime hai, unham va hisaba laina hai
Fajara (amrita vela) di sahu hai
Ate dasa ratam di
Ate jisata ate tanka di
Ate rata di jadom uha jana lage
Ki'um, isa vica tam budhimanam la'i kafi pramana hana
Tusim nahim dekhi'a? Tuhade raba ne ada (kauma-e-ada) de nala ki kita
Khabhi'am vale irama (vade kadam vale) de nala
Jinham varagi ko'i kauma desam vica paida nahim kiti ga'i
Ate samuda de nala, jinham ne (kara di'am) ghati'am vica catanam tarasi'am (ate ghara bana'e)
Ate mekham vale phira'auna de nala
Jinham ne desam vica bagavata kiti
Phira unham vica bahuta phasada faila'i'a
Tam tuhade raba ne unham te saza da kora varasa'i'a
Besaka tuhada raba ghata vica hai
So manukha da mamala iha hai ki jadom usa da raba usa da imatihana lainda hai ate usa nu izata ate ni'amata bakhasada hai, tam uha akhada hai ki mere raba ne mainu sanamana dita hai
Ate jadom uha usa da imatihana lainda hai ate usa da rizaka taga kara dida hai. Tam uha akhada hai ki mere raba ne mainu be-izata kara dita
Kade vi nahim, sagom' tusim anatham da sanamana nahim karade
Ate na tusi' misakina (niradhana) nu bhojana khila'una la'i ika duje nu prerita karade ho
Ate tusim virasata (vica mili daulata) nu ikatha karake kha jande ho
Ate tusim apani ja'idada nala bahuta pi'ara karade ho
Kade vi nahim, jadom dharati nu tora ke reza-reza (kana) kara dita javega
Ate tuhada raba avega (te raga vikhavega), te farisate kataram banha ke a a'unage
Ate usa dina naraka hazira kara diti javegi. Usa dina manukha nu samajha avegi, para usa vele samajhana da mauka kithe
uha akhega ki kasa! Maim apane jivana vica kujha age bhejada
So usa dina na tam alaha de barabara kau'i saza devega
Ate na usa de banhana vanga ko'i banha sakega
He satusata atama
cala apane raba vala. Tu usa tom khusa ate uha tere tom khusa
So mere badi'am vica samila ho
Ate meri janata vica dakhila ho
Nahim, maim sahu khanda ham isa sahira (maka) di
Ate tusim isa vica vasade ho
Ate sahu hai pita (adama) ate usa di aulada di
Asim manukha nu mihanata ate musakalam (vica rahina la'i?) Bana'i'a hai
Ki uha samajhada hai ki usa te kise da zora nahim
Akhada hai ki maim bahuta sara mala kharaca kara dita
Ki uha samajhada hai ki kise ne usa nu nahim dekhi'a
Ki asim unham nu do akham nahim diti'am
ika jibha ate do bul
Ate asim unham nu do raha dasa dite
Phira uha ghati te nahim carhi'a
Tusim ki samajho ki iha ghati ki hai
(Gulami tom) kise di garadana nu chada'una
Jam bhukhe nu bhojana khava'una
Anatha risatedara nu
Jam miti vica rule besahara nu
Phira uha unham lokam vicom hove, jihara imana li'ave ate ika-duje nu dhiraja ate hamadaradi di nasihata kiti
Iha loka hi bhagam vale hana
Ate jihare a'itam tom inakara karana vale hana, uha bada-kisamata hana
Unham te aga cha'i ho'i hovegi
Sahu hai suraja di ate usa di dhupa di
Ate cana di jadom uha suraja de piche nikale
Ate dina di, jadom uha usa nu prakasama'i kara deve
Ate rata di jadom uha usa nu chipa lave
Ate akasa di, ate (usa di) jisa ne usa nu paida kita
Ate dharati di ate (usa di) jisa ne isa nu faila'i'a
Ate jana di ate (usa di) jisa ne isa nu thika kita
Phira isa nu akala diti. Usa di bura'i di ate bhala'i di
Safala ho'i'a, jisane usa (ruha) nu pavitara kita
Ate asafala ho'i'a, jisa ne usa nu maila kita
Samuda ne apane bagipune karana jhuthala'i'a
Jadom unham vicom ika bahuta madabhaga utha kharha ho'i'a
Tam alaha de rasula ne unham nu akhi'a, ki alaha di uthani ate usa de pani pina tom savadhana ho javo

Tam unham ne usa nu jhuthala'i'a, phira uthani nu mara dita. Phira unham de raba ne unham de papam de karana unham te afata bheji. Phira sari'am nu tabaha kara dita. Phira sabha nu barabara kara dita
Uha nahim darada, ki usa tom pichom ki hovega
Sahu hai rata di, jadom uha (dina te) cha jave
Ate dina di jadom uha prakasamana ho jave
Ate usa de paida kite nara ate mada di (sahu)
Ki tuhade yatana vakhare-vakhare hana
Tam jisa ne (alaha de raha vica dhana) dita ate uha dari'a
Ate usa ne bhala'i nu saca mani'a
Tam usa nu asim saukhe raha la'i sahulata devange
Ate jisa ne kajusi kiti ate lapvaha riha
Ate bhala'i tom inakara kita
Tam asim usa nu aukhe raha te pavange
Ate jadom uha kha'i (naraka) vica digega tam usa di ja'idada usa de kama nahim avegi
Besaka sadi zimevari hai raha dasana
Ate besaka sade adhikara vica hai, praloka ate sasara
So maim tuhanu bharakadi ho'i aga tom dara dita
Usa vica uha hi digega jihara bara madabhaga hai
Jisa ne jhuthala'i'a ate muha mauri'a
Zi'ada darana vali'am nu usa tom surakhi'ata rakhi'a javega
Jihara pavitara hona la'i apani ja'idada dida hai
Ate usa da kise te, ko'i upakara nahim?Jisa da badala usa ne laina hove
Pratu sirafa apane azima alaha di khusi la'i
Ate jaladi hi uha prasana ho javega
Sahu hai, prakasama'i dina di
Ate rata di jadom uha (dina te) cha jave
Tuhade raba ne tuhanu nahim chadi'a ate na uha tuhade tom bemukha ho'i'a hai
Ate nisacita rupa nala praloka tuhade la'i sasara tom bihatara hai
Ate jaladi hi alaha tuhanu devega. Phira tu satusata ho javega
Ki alaha ne tuhanu anatha nahim dekhi'a, phira usa ne tuhanu tikana dita
Ate tuhanu labhana vala dekhi'a, tam usa ne tuhanu raha dikha'i'a
Ate tuhanu dhana hina dekhi'a, tam tuhanu (dhana daulata nala) sapana kara dita
Tam tusim anatham te sakhati na karo
Ate tusim bhikhari'am nu na jhirakau
Ate tusim apane raba de upakaram di usatata karom
Ki asim tuhada sina (dila) tuhade la'i nahim' khol'ha dita hai
Ate tuhada uha bhara laha dita
Jisa ne tuhadi pitha jhuka diti si
Ate asim' tuhade nama nu uca kara dita
Tam aukha de nala saukha vi hai
Besaka aukha de nala saukha vi hai
Phira tusim vihale ho javo ate (badagi la'i) mihanata kari'a karo
Ate apane raba vala apana dhi'ana laga'u
Ijira ate jaituna di sahu hai
Ate sina pahara di
Ate isa santi vale nagara (maka) di
Asim manukha nu sohani sakala vala paida kita
Phira usa nu sari'am tom thale suta dita
Na khatama hona vala badala (janata) hai
Tam huna ki hai, jisa tom tusim badala milana tom inakara karade ho
Ki alaha sare hakamam tom vada hakama nahim
parho, apane raba de nama nala, jisa ne paida kita hai
Manukha nu alaka (jame ho'e lahu) tom paida kita
Parho, tera raba bahuta karima hai
Jisa ne kalama nala gi'ana sikha'i'a
Manukha nu uha kujha sikha'i'a jihara uha janada nahim si
Kade vi nahim, manukha bagavata karada hai
Isa adhara te, ki uha apane apa nu atama- nirabhara dekhada hai
Besaka tere raba vala hi vapisa murana hai
Ki tusim usa bade nu dekhi'a, jo manha karada hai
Ika bade nu jadom uha namaza parhada hove
Tuhada ki vicara hai, jekara uha sidhe raha te hove
Jam bhai'a di'am galam sikha'unda hove
Tuhada ki vicara hai, jekara usa ne jhuthala'i'a ate muha mori'a
Ki usa ne nahim samajhi'a ki alaha dekha riha hai
Kade vi nahim jekara uha nahim mani'a, tam asim mathe de vala pakara ke usa nu khicange
Usa mathe nu jihara papi ate jhutha hai
Huna uha sula laina apane samarathakam nu
Asim vi naraka de farisati'am nu sadange
Kade vi usa di gala na manana, ate sijada kara ate (alaha) de nere ho ja
Asim isa nu kadara (bhagam vali, amolaka) di rata nu utari'a hai
Ate tusim ki jano, ki kadara di rata ki hai
Kadara di rata hazara mahini'am nalom utama hai
Farisate ate ruha (jibarila) (isa rata) nu apane raba di agi'a nala utarade hana. Hareka hukama lai ke
Iha rata pahu-phutale taka sapurana salamati vali hai
Kitabam vale (yahudi ate isa'i) ate musarikina (sarika manana vale) vicom' jinham lokam ne inakara kita, uha manana vale nahim. Jadom taka unham de kola sapasata pramana na a jave
Alaha valom ika rasula jihara pavitara sahiphe (gatha) parhake sunave
Jinham vica thika vise likhe hona
Ate jihare loka kitaba vale sana, uha sapasata pramana a jana de ba'ada hi vakha-vakha ho ga'e
Halanki unham nu iha hi hukama dita gi'a si, ki uha alaha di ibadata karana. Usa la'i dina nu ikagara ho ke sudha kara dena ate namaza sathapita karana ate zakata ada karana. Iha hi saca dina hai
Besaka kitaba vale ate musarikinam (sarika manana vale) vicom' jinham lokam ne avagi'a kiti, uha naraka di aga vica painage. Uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Iha loka hi sabha tom baure jiva hana
Uha hi loka jihare imana li'a'e ate unham ne cage kama kite. Iha loka hi sabha tom cage (utama) jiva hana

Unham da badala unham de raba kola hamesa rahina vala baga hai, jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am, uha unham vica hamesa rahinage. Alaha unham tom khusa ate uha alaha tom khusa. Iha usa bade la'i hai, jihara apane raba tom dare
Jadom dharati zora nala hila diti javegi
Ate dharati apana bonjha kadha ke bahara suta devegi
Ate manukha akhega ki isa nu ki ho'i'a
Usa dina dharati apane halatam da varanana karegi
Ki'unki tuhade raba da usa nu iha hi hukama hovega
Usa dina loka alaga-alaga nikalanage. Tam ki unham de karama unham nu dikha'e jana
Tam jisa bade ne tinake barabara vi neki kiti hovegi. Uha usa nu dekha lavega
Ate jisa bade ne tinake barabara bura'i kiti hovegi, uha usa nu dekha lavega
Sahu hai, unham ghori'am di jihare haphade ho'e daurade hana
Phira te khura mara ke cagi'ari kadhana vale
Phira amrita vele chapa marana vale
Phira usa vica dhura uda'una vale
Phira usa same phaujam vica dakhila hona vale
Besaka manukha apane raba da na-sukara hai
Ate uha khuda isa da gavaha hai
Ate uha dhana de moha vica behada jakari'a ho'i'a hai
Ki uha usa same nu nahim janada, jadom uha kabaram vicom kadhi'a javega
Ate kadhi'a javega, jihara (bheda) dilam vica hai
Besaka usa dina unham da raba unham tom cagi taram janu hovega
Khara-khara'una vali
Ki hai khara-khara'una vali
Ate tusim ki jano, ki ki hai, uha khara-khara'una vali
Jisa dina loka patagi'a di taram khil'hare ho'e honage
Ate pahara piji ho'i ragali una di taram ho janage
Phira jisa bade da palara bhari hovega
Uha mana bha'unde arama vica hovega
Ate jisa bade da palara haula hovega
Tam usa da tikana kha'i (naraka) hai
Ate tusim ki jano, ki uha ki hai
Bhatakadi ho'i aga. Suru alaha de nama nala jihara ati'ata miharabana ate rahima farama'una vala hai
Zi'ada de lalaca ne tuhanu bhula rakhi'a hai
Ithom taka ki tusim kabaram vica ja puje
Kade vi nahim, tusim bahuta jaladi jana lavauge
Phira kade vi nahim, tusim bahuta jaladi jana lavoge
Kade vi nahim, jekara tusim visavasa de nala janade
Ki tusim naraka nu zarura dekhauge
Phira tusim usa nu visavasa di akha nala dekhoge
Phira usa dina yakinana tuhade tom ni'amatam de sabadhi zarura pucha hovegi
Sahu hai, zamane di
Besaka manukha ghate vica hana
Paratu jihare loka imana li'a'e ate cage karama kite ate unham ne ika duje nu saca'i da upadesa dita. Ate unham ne ika duje nu dhiraja rakhana da upedasa dita
Vinasa hai hareka vi'aga kasana vale ate nukasa kadhana vale la'i
Jisa ne ja'idada nu ikatha kita ate gina-gina ke rakhi'a
Uha socada hai ki usa di ja'idada hamesa usa de nala rahegi
Kade vi nahim, uha raundana vali jag'ha vica suti'a javega
Ate tusim ki jano ki uha raundana vali jag'ha ki hai
Alaha di bhataka'i ho'i aga
Jihari dilam taka pujegi
Uha unham la'i bada kara diti javegi
Uce-uce khabi'am vica
Ki tusim nahim vekhi'a, ki tuhade raba ne hathi vali'am de nala ki kita
Ki usa ne unham di sakima nu asafala nahim kara dita
ate unham te jhudam de jhuda ciri'am de(aba-bila) bheje
Jihari'am unham te kakaram di'am pathari'am sutadi'am sana
Phira alaha ne unham nu khadhe ho'e ghaha-care di taram kara dita
Isa la'i ki kuraisa adi ho ga'e
Saradi ate garami de safara de
Tam unham nu cahida hai ki uha isa ghara de raba di sadagi karana
Jisa ne unham nu kukhi'am nu bhojana dita ate bhai'a tom unham nu amana dita
Ki tusim usa bade nu nahim dekhi'a jihara inasapha de dina tom inakara karada hai
Uha hi hai, jihara anatham nu dhake marada hai
Ate niradhana nu bhojana khava'una di prerana nahim dida
Tam unham namaza parhana vali'am la'i vinasa hai
Jihare apani namaza tom lapravaha hana
Uha jihare dikhava karade hana
Jihare ama loram di'am vasatu'am vi nahim' dide
Asim tuhanu kausara (janata di nahira) bakhasa diti
Tam apane raba la'i namaza parho ate kurabani (ti'aga) karo
Besaka tuhada vairi hi be-aulada rahega. (Bhava usa da nisana baki nahim rahega)
Akho, ki he avagi'akari'o
mai' unham di ibadata (suta prasati) nahim' karanga, jinham di upasana (buta-prasati) tusi' karade ho
Ate na tusim usa (alaha) di ibadata karana vale ho, jisa di ibadata maim karada ham
Ate mai' unham di ibadata karana vala nahim' ham, jinham di ibadata tusim kiti hai
Ate na tusim usa di ibadata karana vale ho, jisa di ibadata maim karada ham
Tuhade la'i tuhada dina ate mere la'i mera dina
Jadom alaha di madada a ga'i ate jita (ho ga'i)
Ate tusim dekhoge ki loka jathi'am de jathe alaha de dina vica samila ho rahe hana
Tam apane raba di sifata salaha karo, usa di prasasa de nala ate usa tom mu'afi mago. Besaka uha mu'afa karana vala hai
Abu lahaba de hatha tuta jana ate uha khatama ho jave
Na usa di ja'idada usa de kama a'i ate na uha jihara usa ne kama'i'a
Uha cheti hi bhatakadi ho'i aga vica digega
Usa di patani vi jihari sira te balana cuki phiradi hai
Usa di garadana vica vati ho'i rasi hai
Akho, ki uha alaha ika hai
Alaha kise ciza da loravada nahim
Na usa di ko'i aulada hai ate na uha kise di aulada
Ate ko'i usa de barabara nahim
Akho, maim sarana magada ham, savera de raba di
Hara ciza di bura'i tom jihari usa ne paida kiti
Hanere di bura'i tom jadom uha (hanera) cha jave
Ate gadham te (parha-parha ke) phukam marana vali'am di bura'i tom
Ate irakha karana vale'di bura'i tom, jadom uha irakha kare
Akho, maim sarana magada ham, lokam de raba di
Lokam de patasaha di
Lokam de pujanika di
(Saitana) vasavasa (mara khi'ala) pa'una vale di bura'i tom, jihara (alaha da nama suna ke) luka janda hai
Jihara lokam de dilam vica vasavasa (mara khi'ala) pa'unda hai
Jinam vicom jam manukham vicom
